table_summary:
Table Name: Industry Financial Metrics

Table Summary: This table contains financial metrics for various industries, including risk measures, tax rates, and other financial indicators. The columns include the industry name, number of firms, beta value, debt-to-equity ratio, effective tax rate, unlevered beta, cash as a percentage of firm value, unlevered beta corrected for cash, high-low risk measure, standard deviation of equity, standard deviation in operating income over the last 10 years, and values for the years 2020, 2021, 2022, and an average value from 2020 to 2024. The data provides a comprehensive overview of the financial health and risk profiles of different industries.
